_comment: Create this cron job via OpenClaw cron tool: cron(action='add', job={...})
name: memory-observer

payload.message:
Run the memory observer: exec bash ~/clawd/scripts/observer.sh

After it completes, check ~/clawd/memory/observations.md word count. If over 8000 words, also run: exec bash ~/clawd/scripts/reflector.sh

Reply with NO_REPLY when done.
